statements: SELECT * FROM referee_information;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM referee_information;
SELECT referee_id, full_name FROM referee_information WHERE referee_level = 'Senior';
SELECT * FROM match_assignments;
SELECT match_id, referee_id FROM match_assignments WHERE venue LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT referee_id, action_type, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT DISTINCT referee_id FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Warning';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM referee_information WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referee_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT full_name, email, referee_level FROM referee_information WHERE full_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT referee_id, full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level FROM referee_information ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT match_id, referee_id, assigned_date FROM match_assignments WHERE assigned_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT referee_id, action_type, description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type IN ('Suspension', 'Fine');
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM disciplinary_actions GROUP BY referee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT referee_id FROM match_assignments WHERE result = 'Draw';
SELECT full_name, email FROM referee_information WHERE referee_id IN (SELECT referee_id FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Suspension');
SELECT referee_id, full_name, email FROM referee_information WHERE referee_id NOT IN (SELECT referee_id FROM match_assignments);

SELECT full_name, referee_level, COUNT(*) AS num_assignments FROM match_assignments JOIN referee_information ON match_assignments.referee_id = referee_information.referee_id GROUP BY full_name, referee_level;

SELECT full_name, email, assigned_date FROM referee_information JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id WHERE referee_level = 'Elite' AND assigned_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM referee_information;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referee_information;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments;
SELECT match_id, referee_id, venue FROM match_assignments;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM referee_information WHERE referee_level = 'Senior';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM referee_information WHERE referee_level = 'Junior';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT action_type, action_date, description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE referee_id = '123456';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level FROM referee_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level FROM referee_information WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level FROM referee_information ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level FROM referee_information ORDER BY referee_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE assigned_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level, venue FROM referee_information INNER JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id;

SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level, venue, result FROM referee_information INNER JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id WHERE result = 'Loss';

SELECT full_name, email, referee_level, action_type, action_date FROM referee_information INNER JOIN disciplinary_actions ON referee_information.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id WHERE action_type = 'Warning';

SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level, venue, result, action_type FROM referee_information INNER JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id INNER JOIN disciplinary_actions ON referee_information.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id WHERE action_type = 'Penalty';

SELECT full_name, email, phone_number, referee_level, venue, assigned_date, result, action_type, description FROM referee_information INNER JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id INNER JOIN disciplinary_actions ON referee_information.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id WHERE action_type = 'Suspension';
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM matches WHERE referee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT match_id, match_date, match_location FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE disciplinary_action IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees WHERE experience_years BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT match_id, referee_id, match_date, match_location FROM matches WHERE referee_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE experience_years < 4;
SELECT match_id, match_date, match_location FROM matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE disciplinary_action LIKE '%fine%';
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE name <> 'Alice Smith';
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM matches ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE name IN ('Bob Jones', 'Sarah Brown');
SELECT match_id, match_location FROM matches WHERE match_location = 'Field B';
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM referees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM referees;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT match_id, match_date FROM matches WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT referee_id FROM matches;
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(match_id) AS total_matches FROM matches GROUP BY referee_id;
SELECT name, experience_years, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM referees LEFT JOIN matches ON referees.id = matches.referee_id GROUP BY name, experience_years;
SELECT * FROM referees JOIN matches ON referees.id = matches.referee_id;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE disciplinary_action IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT AVG(experience_years) AS avg_experience FROM referees;
SELECT MAX(experience_years) AS max_experience, MIN(experience_years) AS min_experience FROM referees;
SELECT AVG(experience_years) AS avg_experience, MAX(experience_years) AS max_experience, MIN(experience_years) AS min_experience FROM referees;
SELECT name, experience_years FROM referees WHERE experience_years BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_location IN ('Stadium A', 'Field B');
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(match_id) AS total_matches FROM matches GROUP BY referee_id HAVING total_matches > 10;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM referees);
SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT name, email FROM Referees;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Referees;
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments;
SELECT referee_id, match_id FROM MatchAssignments;
SELECT assignment_date FROM MatchAssignments;
SELECT * FROM DisciplinaryActions;
SELECT referee_id, action_type FROM DisciplinaryActions;
SELECT referee_id, match_id, action_date FROM DisciplinaryActions;
SELECT id, email FROM Referees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM Referees WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments WHERE referee_id = 2;
SELECT referee_id, match_id FROM MatchAssignments WHERE assignment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DisciplinaryActions WHERE action_type = 'warning';
SELECT referee_id, action_date FROM DisciplinaryActions WHERE referee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Referees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM Referees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments WHERE referee_id = 4 AND match_id = 7;
SELECT referee_id, action_type FROM DisciplinaryActions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Referees;
SELECT id, name FROM Referees WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM MatchAssignments WHERE assignment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT Referees.name, DisciplinaryActions.action_type FROM Referees JOIN DisciplinaryActions ON Referees.id = DisciplinaryActions.referee_id;
SELECT Referees.name, MatchAssignments.match_id FROM Referees JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id WHERE MatchAssignments.assignment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(assignment_id) AS max_assignment_id FROM MatchAssignments;
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(match_id) AS total_matches FROM MatchAssignments GROUP BY referee_id;
SELECT Referees.name, COUNT(DisciplinaryActions.action_id) AS total_actions FROM Referees LEFT JOIN DisciplinaryActions ON Referees.id = DisciplinaryActions.referee_id GROUP BY Referees.name;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), assignment_date)) AS avg_days_since_assignment FROM MatchAssignments;
SELECT DISTINCT referee_id FROM DisciplinaryActions;

SELECT Referees.name AS referee_name, DisciplinaryActions.action_type AS action_type, MatchAssignments.assignment_date AS assignment_date FROM Referees JOIN DisciplinaryActions ON Referees.id = DisciplinaryActions.referee_id JOIN MatchAssignments ON DisciplinaryActions.referee_id = MatchAssignments.referee_id WHERE MatchAssignments.assignment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email FROM Referees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';

SELECT Referees.name AS referee_name, DisciplinaryActions.action_type AS action_type, DisciplinaryActions.action_date AS action_date FROM Referees JOIN DisciplinaryActions ON Referees.id = DisciplinaryActions.referee_id WHERE DisciplinaryActions.action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT referee_id, COUNT(action_id) AS total_actions FROM DisciplinaryActions GROUP BY referee_id HAVING COUNT(action_id) > 1;

SELECT Referees.name, MatchAssignments.assignment_date, DisciplinaryActions.action_type FROM Referees LEFT JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id LEFT JOIN DisciplinaryActions ON Referees.id = DisciplinaryActions.referee_id AND MatchAssignments.match_id = DisciplinaryActions.match_id;
SELECT DISTINCT MatchAssignments.match_id FROM MatchAssignments WHERE MatchAssignments.assignment_date < '2022-12-01';

SELECT Referees.name, MatchAssignments.assignment_date FROM Referees JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id WHERE MatchAssignments.assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT action_type, COUNT(action_id) AS total_actions FROM DisciplinaryActions GROUP BY action_type;

SELECT Referees.name AS referee_name, COUNT(MatchAssignments.match_id) AS total_assignments FROM Referees LEFT JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id GROUP BY referee_name HAVING total_assignments > 10;

SELECT Referees.name AS referee_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), assignment_date)) AS avg_days_since_assignment FROM Referees JOIN MatchAssignments ON Referees.id = MatchAssignments.referee_id GROUP BY referee_name ORDER BY avg_days_since_assignment DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referees;
SELECT referee_id, full_name, phone_number FROM referees;
SELECT * FROM matches;
SELECT date, location, home_team, away_team FROM matches;
SELECT match_id, referee_id FROM matches;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT action_type, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments;
SELECT match_id, referee_id, assignment_date FROM match_assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_type FROM match_assignments;
SELECT * FROM referees WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referees WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT date, home_team, away_team FROM matches WHERE home_team = 'Team X';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Red Card';
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE referee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE assignment_type = 'Assistant';
SELECT assignment_id, match_id, referee_id FROM match_assignments WHERE referee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM referees;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referees WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT full_name, email FROM referees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT r.full_name, m.date FROM referees r JOIN matches m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id;
SELECT referees.full_name, matches.location FROM referees JOIN matches ON referees.referee_id = matches.referee_id;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT m.home_team, m.away_team, r.full_name FROM matches m JOIN referees r ON m.referee_id = r.referee_id;
SELECT r.full_name, ma.assignment_date FROM referees r JOIN match_assignments ma ON r.referee_id = ma.referee_id;
SELECT referees.full_name, ma.assignment_date, ma.assignment_type FROM referees JOIN match_assignments ma ON referees.referee_id = ma.referee_id;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Red Card';
SELECT da.action_type, da.action_description, m.location FROM disciplinary_actions da JOIN matches m ON da.match_id = m.match_id;
SELECT ma.assignment_type, m.location, r.full_name FROM match_assignments ma JOIN matches m ON ma.match_id = m.match_id JOIN referees r ON ma.referee_id = r.referee_id;

SELECT r.full_name AS referee_name, m.date AS match_date, ma.assignment_date, ma.assignment_type FROM referees r JOIN match_assignments ma ON r.referee_id = ma.referee_id JOIN matches m ON ma.match_id = m.match_id;

SELECT da.action_type, da.action_date, r.full_name AS referee_name, m.home_team, m.away_team FROM disciplinary_actions da JOIN referees r ON da.referee_id = r.referee_id JOIN matches m ON da.match_id = m.match_id;
SELECT r.full_name, m.date, ma.assignment_type FROM referees r JOIN match_assignments ma ON r.referee_id = ma.referee_id JOIN matches m ON ma.match_id = m.match_id WHERE r.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT r.full_name, m.location, da.action_description FROM referees r JOIN matches m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id JOIN disciplinary_actions da ON m.match_id = da.match_id WHERE r.phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT m.match_id, m.date, r.full_name AS referee_name, da.action_type FROM matches m JOIN referees r ON m.referee_id = r.referee_id JOIN disciplinary_actions da ON m.match_id = da.match_id;

SELECT r.full_name, da.action_type, ma.assignment_date FROM referees r JOIN disciplinary_actions da ON r.referee_id = da.referee_id JOIN match_assignments ma ON r.referee_id = ma.referee_id WHERE da.action_type = 'Yellow Card';

SELECT r.full_name, m.home_team, m.away_team, da.action_type, da.action_description FROM referees r JOIN matches m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id JOIN disciplinary_actions da ON m.match_id = da.match_id WHERE m.location = 'Stadium B';
SELECT * FROM referee_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM referee_information;
SELECT referee_id, first_name, email FROM referee_information;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments;
SELECT referee_id, match_id, assignment_date FROM match_assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, referee_id, match_id FROM match_assignments;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT referee_id, action_date, reason FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT action_id, referee_id FROM disciplinary_actions;

SELECT referee_information.referee_id, referee_information.first_name, match_assignments.match_id FROM referee_information INNER JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id;

SELECT referee_information.first_name, referee_information.last_name, disciplinary_actions.reason FROM referee_information LEFT JOIN disciplinary_actions ON referee_information.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id;
SELECT match_assignments.match_id, disciplinary_actions.reason FROM match_assignments INNER JOIN disciplinary_actions ON match_assignments.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id;

SELECT referee_information.first_name, match_assignments.assignment_date, disciplinary_actions.action_date FROM referee_information LEFT JOIN match_assignments ON referee_information.referee_id = match_assignments.referee_id LEFT JOIN disciplinary_actions ON referee_information.referee_id = disciplinary_actions.referee_id;
SELECT * FROM referee_information WHERE referee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM referee_information WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM match_assignments WHERE referee_id = 1 AND assignment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id FROM match_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT referee_id, reason FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT referee_id, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE reason LIKE '%misconduct%';
SELECT * FROM referee_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM referee_information;
SELECT * FROM match_assignments;
SELECT referee_id, assignment_date FROM match_assignments;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT action_id, referee_id, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id, m.assignment_date FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, d.reason FROM referee_information r JOIN disciplinary_actions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, d.action_date FROM referee_information r JOIN disciplinary_actions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id WHERE d.reason = 'Red Card';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id WHERE m.assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id WHERE m.assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, d.reason FROM referee_information r JOIN disciplinary_actions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id WHERE d.action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id WHERE m.assignment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, d.reason FROM referee_information r JOIN disciplinary_actions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id WHERE d.reason LIKE '%foul%';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id ORDER BY m.assignment_date ASC;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, d.reason FROM referee_information r JOIN disciplinary_actions d ON r.referee_id = d.referee_id ORDER BY d.action_date DESC;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, m.match_id FROM referee_information r JOIN match_assignments m ON r.referee_id = m.referee_id WHERE m.match_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT referee_id) AS total_referees FROM referee_information;
SELECT AVG(assignment_date) AS average_assignment_date FROM match_assignments;
